title: Video | Vaccine Safety, Precautions, Side-Effects: All You Need To Know
author: Rishika Baruah
description: The vaccination drive against the coronavirus has been opened for the general public. Those above 60 and those above 45 with comorbidities are eligible in this phase for vaccination. But many people, especially the senior citizens, have questions on pre-existing conditions, medication. On FYI, a panel of expert doctors answer all these questions.
